title: Find the first element
description: Given a list of integers, the task is to get the first element of the list.

title: Find duplicate elements
description: Given a list containing some integers, the task is to find the duplicate elements in this list.

title: Count occurrence of a given character
description: Given a string and a character, the task is to make a function which counts the occurrence of the given character in the string using Stream API.

title: Find the Maximum Value in an Array
description: Given an integer array nums, return the maximum value from the array.

title: Sum of All Elements in an Array
description: Given an integer array nums, return the sum of all elements.

title: Count Even Numbers in an Array
description: Given an integer array nums, return the count of even numbers.

title: Check if All Elements Are Positive
description: Given an integer array nums, return true if all elements are positive, otherwise return false.

title: Find First Positive Number
description: Given an integer array nums, return the first positive number found in the array. If no positive number is found, return -1.

title: Find the Minimum Value in an Array
description: Given an integer array nums, return the minimum value from the array.

title: Group Anagrams
description: Given an array of strings, group the anagrams together. Two strings are considered anagrams if they contain the same characters in any order. Return a list of lists, where each list contains all the anagrams from the input array.

title: Find the Top K Frequent Elements
description: Given an integer array nums and an integer k, return the k most frequent elements.

title: Find the Intersection of Two Arrays
description: Given two integer arrays nums1 and nums2, return an array of their intersection. Each element in the result must be unique.

title: Find the Missing Number in an Array
description: Given an array containing n distinct numbers taken from 0, 1, 2, ..., n, find the one that is missing from the array.

title: Two Sum
description:
Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target.
You may assume that each input would have exactly one solution, and you may not use the same element twice.

You can return the answer in any order.
